org.researchstack.skin

Class PermissionRequestManager.PermissionRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.researchstack.skin.PermissionRequestManager.PermissionRequest
  • Enclosing class:
    PermissionRequestManager

    public static class PermissionRequestManager.PermissionRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents a permission that the user needs to grant

    • Constructor Detail

      • PermissionRequest

        public PermissionRequest(java.lang.String id,
                         @DrawableRes
                         int iconRes,
                         @StringRes
                         int titleRes,
                         @StringRes
                         int textRes)
        Default constructor to initialize a PermissinoRequest
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the request
        iconRes - the icon used to display a UI in the PermissionStepLayout
        titleRes - the title used to display a UI in the PermissionStepLayout
        textRes - the explanation used to display a UI in the PermissionStepLayout

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Returns the id of the permission. If this is a system permission then it should originate from Manifest.permission
        Returns:
        id of the permission

      • getIcon

        @DrawableRes
public int getIcon()
        Icon of the permission used when displaying UI in the PermissionStepLayout
        Returns:
        drawable resource id

      • getTitle

        @StringRes
public int getTitle()
        Title of the permission used when displaying UI in the PermissionStepLayout
        Returns:
        string resource id

      • getText

        @StringRes
public int getText()
        The explanation used when displaying UI in the PermissionStepLayout
        Returns:
        string resource id

      • setIsBlockingPermission

        public void setIsBlockingPermission(boolean blocking)
        This paramter is used in the PermissionStepLayout that makes a permission optional or not. The user will not be allowed past the step if there are still some permissions havent been granted which this property set to true
        Parameters:
        blocking - true if the user needs to take action on this permission

      • isBlockingPermission

        public boolean isBlockingPermission()
        Returns true if this permissino is blocking
        Returns:
        true if the permission needs to be granted in PermissionStepLayout

      • setIsSystemPermission

        public void setIsSystemPermission(boolean system)
        Sets to true if the permission should be handled by the system grant flow
        Parameters:
        system - true if this is a system permission

      • isSystemPermission

        public boolean isSystemPermission()
        Returns true if PermissionRequest should be handled by the system grant flow
        Returns:
        true if PermissionRequest should be handled by the system grant flow
